name: DER-ET
description:
Two guys walk into a bar..
 ..there's a murder!?

🍷🍷🍷

DER-ET (DEMO) is a mystery-solving, story-heavy game created by MahAnP.

You play as the "detective" and the "assistant" as they investigate, question, and discuss a murder at an otherworldly bar.

 🕒Duration : 30-45 minutes

 ⚠️Content Warning : depictions of murder, death, blood, and alcohol.

❗You need the RPG Maker VX Ace RTP to play this game❗

🥛🥛🥛

FEATURES (DEMO)

-Original faceset for the main characters

-Original Ending Theme

-A couple of jumpscares

-A couple of "endings"

-Lots of sound effects

-Lots of text

-Screen shakes

-Penalty system

-Bromance

Your choice matters. Each one of it.

🍷🥛🍷🥛

DEV NOTES

Unfortunately, the completion of this game is undecided. We'll have to wait and see..

Comments, critiques, suggestions, bug reports, and the like are greatly appreciated. Especially fanarts!!

I'm more of a little artist than an indie gamedev, so please consider following my instagram or twitter? :>

Thank you so much for downloading!
